holidays.description: It is not always about getting cured but about learning how to live with it.

holidays.title: National Cancer Awareness Day
holidays.description: Two-thirds of cancer cases are diagnosed at an advanced stage, reducing patients’ chances of survival.

holidays.title: National Programmatic Advertising Day
holidays.description: There will be no commercial activity without advertising. So, today we celebrate programmatic advertising!

holidays.title: Notary Public Day

holidays.title: Recreation Day
holidays.description: Recreation Day is celebrated in northern Tasmania, Australia, on the first Monday in November.
